physical_appearance: The image shows a black-and-white photograph. It is rectangular and it features a multi-storey building. It comes with a portico and two sets of balustrades attached to the columns adorn it. There is a staircase leading up to the entrance of the building. There are tall and short trees and greenery around the building.
title_text: 12 Scotts Road, Our Billett 1946 Photography Album (donation from Anthony Robert Saint Claire)
